entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 4.8°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 54 %

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
